attributes.action: Replace David Cameron with a Prime Minister who is honest and will protect the United Kingdom and listen to the people.
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron has proved himself to be an inveterate liar with no concern for the interests of the United Kingdom or the wishes of the British people. He is also in breach of his Oath when sworn of the Privy Council. As the leader of a political party with less than 25% support of the electorate, he has no mandate to continue to ruin the United Kingdom. Note that his deputy, Clegg, has even less mandate. Cameron must go NOW!
